data.system_settings: Android 4.4.4, Tablet Allview Viva H8 LTE
data.actual_result: It says only the name of the last badge
data.expected_result: The system message should say the name of all the badges
data.short_description: When clicking on the badges of a user that have multiple badges on their profile, only the name of the last one pops up
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a user profile that have multiple badges - Click on the badges - Observe the system message that appears
